elements.name: Hydrogen
elements.uses: Hydrogen is used in fuel cells and the production of ammonia.

elements.name: Helium
elements.uses: Helium is used in balloons and as a coolant for nuclear reactors.

elements.name: Lithium
elements.uses: Lithium is used in rechargeable batteries and psychiatric medications.

elements.name: Beryllium
elements.uses: Beryllium is used in aerospace materials and X-ray equipment.

elements.name: Boron
elements.uses: Boron is used in glassmaking and detergents.

elements.name: Carbon
elements.uses: Carbon is used in fuels, plastics, and as a key component in all known life.

elements.name: Nitrogen
elements.uses: Nitrogen is used in fertilizers and as a refrigerant.

elements.name: Oxygen
elements.uses: Oxygen is used in respiration, steelmaking, and rocket fuel.

elements.name: Fluorine
elements.uses: Fluorine is used in toothpaste and Teflon production.

elements.name: Neon
elements.uses: Neon is used in neon signs and high-voltage indicators.

elements.name: Sodium
elements.uses: Sodium is used in streetlights and as a coolant in some reactors.

elements.name: Magnesium
elements.uses: Magnesium is used in flares, fireworks, and aircraft materials.

elements.name: Aluminum
elements.uses: Aluminum is used in construction, packaging, and electrical applications.

elements.name: Silicon
elements.uses: Silicon is used in electronics, solar cells, and as a semiconductor material.

elements.name: Phosphorus
elements.uses: Phosphorus is used in fertilizers, detergents, and as a component in matches.

elements.name: Sulfur
elements.uses: Sulfur is used in the production of sulfuric acid, fertilizers, and as a fungicide.

elements.name: Chlorine
elements.uses: Chlorine is used in disinfectants, bleach, and in the production of various chemicals.

elements.name: Argon
elements.uses: Argon is used in inert gas welding and in neon signs.

elements.name: Potassium
elements.uses: Potassium is used in fertilizers, as a salt substitute, and in fireworks.

elements.name: Calcium
elements.uses: Calcium is used in cement, in the production of lime, and as a dietary supplement.

elements.name: Scandium
elements.uses: Scandium is used in aerospace components, sports equipment, and as an alloying agent.

elements.name: Titanium
elements.uses: Titanium is used in aerospace, medical implants, and as a pigment in paints.

elements.name: Vanadium
elements.uses: Vanadium is used in steel alloys, batteries, and as a catalyst in chemical reactions.

elements.name: Chromium
elements.uses: Chromium is used in stainless steel, plating, and pigments.

elements.name: Manganese
elements.uses: Manganese is used in steel production, batteries, and as a pigment.

elements.name: Iron
elements.uses: Iron is used in construction, manufacturing, and as a component in steel.

elements.name: Cobalt
elements.uses: Cobalt is used in batteries, alloys, and as a catalyst.

elements.name: Nickel
elements.uses: Nickel is used in stainless steel, coins, and batteries.

elements.name: Copper
elements.uses: Copper is used in electrical wiring, plumbing, and as a material for coins.

elements.name: Zinc
elements.uses: Zinc is used in galvanizing, alloys, and batteries.

elements.name: Gallium
elements.uses: Gallium is used in semiconductors, LED technology, and in solar panels.

elements.name: Germanium
elements.uses: Germanium is used in semiconductors, fiber optics, and infrared optics.

elements.name: Arsenic
elements.uses: Arsenic is used in pesticides, semiconductors, and as a wood preservative.

elements.name: Selenium
elements.uses: Selenium is used in glassmaking, electronics, and as a dietary supplement.

elements.name: Bromine
elements.uses: Bromine is used in flame retardants, pharmaceuticals, and as a disinfectant.

elements.name: Krypton
elements.uses: Krypton is used in lighting, lasers, and as an inert gas in certain types of electrical equipment.

elements.name: Rubidium
elements.uses: Rubidium is used in research, special glasses, and in atomic clocks.

elements.name: Strontium
elements.uses: Strontium is used in fireworks, magnets, and in the production of glass.

elements.name: Yttrium
elements.uses: Yttrium is used in LEDs, phosphors, and in certain high-temperature superconductors.

elements.name: Zirconium
elements.uses: Zirconium is used in nuclear reactors, ceramics, and as a refractory material.

elements.name: Niobium
elements.uses: Niobium is used in superconductors, stainless steel, and as an alloying agent.

elements.name: Molybdenum
elements.uses: Molybdenum is used in steel alloys, electrical contacts, and as a catalyst.

elements.name: Technetium
elements.uses: Technetium is used in medical imaging, as a tracer in nuclear medicine, and in research.

elements.name: Ruthenium
elements.uses: Ruthenium is used in electrical contacts, catalysts, and in jewelry.

elements.name: Rhodium
elements.uses: Rhodium is used in catalytic converters, jewelry, and as a plating material.

elements.name: Palladium
elements.uses: Palladium is used in catalytic converters, jewelry, and in hydrogen storage.

elements.name: Silver
elements.uses: Silver is used in jewelry, electronics, and as a currency standard.

elements.name: Cadmium
elements.uses: Cadmium is used in batteries, pigments, and coatings.

elements.name: Indium
elements.uses: Indium is used in electronics, soldering, and in LCD screens.

elements.name: Tin
elements.uses: Tin is used in soldering, plating, and in alloys such as bronze.

elements.name: Antimony
elements.uses: Antimony is used in flame retardants, alloys, and in electronics.

elements.name: Tellurium
elements.uses: Tellurium is used in metallurgy, as a semiconductor, and in solar cells.

elements.name: Iodine
elements.uses: Iodine is used in disinfection, in thyroid hormones, and as a contrast agent in medical imaging.

elements.name: Xenon
elements.uses: Xenon is used in lighting, anesthesia, and as a general anesthetic.

elements.name: Cesium
elements.uses: Cesium is used in atomic clocks, as a getter in vacuum tubes, and in oil drilling.

elements.name: Barium
elements.uses: Barium is used in X-ray imaging, in fireworks, and in lubricants.

elements.name: Lanthanum
elements.uses: Lanthanum is used in camera lenses, high-intensity lighting, and in batteries.

elements.name: Cerium
elements.uses: Cerium is used in catalytic converters, glass polishing, and as a catalyst in petroleum refining.

elements.name: Praseodymium
elements.uses: Praseodymium is used in strong permanent magnets, laser materials, and as an alloying agent.

elements.name: Neodymium
elements.uses: Neodymium is used in powerful magnets, lasers, and as an alloying agent.

elements.name: Promethium
elements.uses: Promethium is used in luminous paint, atomic batteries, and in research.

elements.name: Samarium
elements.uses: Samarium is used in magnets, cancer treatment, and in catalysts.

elements.name: Europium
elements.uses: Europium is used in phosphors, LED lights, and as a doping agent in lasers.

elements.name: Gadolinium
elements.uses: Gadolinium is used in MRI contrast agents, phosphors, and in nuclear reactors.

elements.name: Terbium
elements.uses: Terbium is used in phosphors, magnets, and in solid-state devices.

elements.name: Dysprosium
elements.uses: Dysprosium is used in nuclear reactors, magnets, and laser materials.

elements.name: Holmium
elements.uses: Holmium is used in nuclear reactors, magnetic alloys, and in lasers.

elements.name: Erbium
elements.uses: Erbium is used in lasers, fiber optics, and vanadium steel.

elements.name: Thulium
elements.uses: Thulium is used in portable X-ray devices and in lasers.

elements.name: Ytterbium
elements.uses: Ytterbium is used in improving the grain refinement of steel, in some lasers, and as a doping agent.

elements.name: Lutetium
elements.uses: Lutetium is used in PET scan detectors, catalysts, and in radiotherapy.

elements.name: Hafnium
elements.uses: Hafnium is used in control rods for nuclear reactors, in superalloys, and as a coating for cutting tools.

elements.name: Tantalum
elements.uses: Tantalum is used in capacitors, surgical implants, and corrosion-resistant materials.

elements.name: Tungsten
elements.uses: Tungsten is used in light bulb filaments, x-ray tubes, and high-temperature alloys.

elements.name: Rhenium
elements.uses: Rhenium is used in jet engines, catalysts, and in high-temperature superalloys.

elements.name: Osmium
elements.uses: Osmium is used in fountain pen nibs, electrical contacts, and in alloys with platinum.

elements.name: Iridium
elements.uses: Iridium is used in spark plugs, crucibles, and in hard alloys.

elements.name: Platinum
elements.uses: Platinum is used in catalytic converters, jewelry, and electronics.

elements.name: Gold
elements.uses: Gold is used in jewelry, electronics, and as a financial standard.

elements.name: Mercury
elements.uses: Mercury is used in thermometers, barometers, and fluorescent lamps.

elements.name: Thallium
elements.uses: Thallium is used in electronics, optical glass, and medical imaging.

elements.name: Lead
elements.uses: Lead is used in batteries, radiation shielding, and pigments.

elements.name: Bismuth
elements.uses: Bismuth is used in pharmaceuticals, cosmetics, and low-melting alloys.

elements.name: Polonium
elements.uses: Polonium is used in anti-static devices and in research as a heat source.

elements.name: Astatine
elements.uses: Astatine is used in cancer treatment and research due to its radioactivity.

elements.name: Radon
elements.uses: Radon is used in cancer treatment and in research for studying air quality.

elements.name: Francium
elements.uses: Francium is used in atomic research and has no significant commercial applications.

elements.name: Radium
elements.uses: Radium is used in radiotherapy for cancer treatment and in luminescent paints.

elements.name: Actinium
elements.uses: Actinium is used in cancer treatment and as a neutron source in scientific research.

elements.name: Thorium
elements.uses: Thorium is used in nuclear reactors and in high-temperature ceramics.

elements.name: Protactinium
elements.uses: Protactinium is used in research and has limited applications due to its rarity and radioactivity.

elements.name: Uranium
elements.uses: Uranium is used as fuel in nuclear power plants and in military weapons.

elements.name: Neptunium
elements.uses: Neptunium is used in neutron detection equipment and in scientific research.

elements.name: Plutonium
elements.uses: Plutonium is used in nuclear reactors, weapons, and space exploration.

elements.name: Americium
elements.uses: Americium is used in smoke detectors and in neutron sources.

elements.name: Curium
elements.uses: Curium is used in space exploration as a power source and in scientific research.

elements.name: Berkelium
elements.uses: Berkelium is used in scientific research and in the synthesis of heavier elements.

elements.name: Californium
elements.uses: Californium is used in nuclear reactors and for neutron radiography.

elements.name: Einsteinium
elements.uses: Einsteinium is mainly used for scientific research.

elements.name: Fermium
elements.uses: Fermium is used in scientific research.

elements.name: Mendelevium
elements.uses: Mendelevium is used for research purposes.

elements.name: Nobelium
elements.uses: Nobelium is used in scientific research.

elements.name: Lawrencium
elements.uses: Lawrencium is used in scientific research.

elements.name: Rutherfordium
elements.uses: Rutherfordium is used in scientific research.

elements.name: Dubnium
elements.uses: Dubnium is used in scientific research.

elements.name: Seaborgium
elements.uses: Seaborgium is used in scientific research.

elements.name: Bohrium
elements.uses: Bohrium is used in scientific research.

elements.name: Hassium
elements.uses: Hassium is used in scientific research.

elements.name: Meitnerium
elements.uses: Meitnerium is used in scientific research.

elements.name: Darmstadtium
elements.uses: Darmstadtium is used for scientific research.

elements.name: Roentgenium
elements.uses: Roentgenium is used for scientific research.

elements.name: Copernicium
elements.uses: Copernicium is used for scientific research.

elements.name: Nihonium
elements.uses: Nihonium is used for scientific research.

elements.name: Flerovium
elements.uses: Flerovium is used for scientific research.

elements.name: Moscovium
elements.uses: Moscovium is used for scientific research.

elements.name: Livermorium
elements.uses: Livermorium is used for scientific research.

elements.name: Tennessine
elements.uses: Tennessine is used for scientific research.

elements.name: Oganesson
elements.uses: Oganesson is used for scientific research.
